biocontainers.name: svviz
biocontainers.summary: A read visualizer for structural variants

biotools.summary: Visualizes high-throughput sequencing data relevant to a structural variant. Only reads supporting the variant or the reference allele will be shown.

bioschemas.name: svviz
bioschemas.summary: Visualizes high-throughput sequencing data relevant to a structural variant. Only reads supporting the variant or the reference allele will be shown.
